short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: The world's first ai-driven ad extension to locate, copy, and rewrite profitable facebook ads in record time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use the Facebook Re-edit extension to save things you see on the Facebook ads descriptions.
You can edit and generate a new description by your own writing styles and tones using ChatGPT and save the descriptions to google doc
